Gang let me bring this to your attention as well: 
 
http://www.aoi-art.ab.psiweb.com/sword/consigned/cksword08.html
 
Does anyone know of any good papers or books dealing specifically with
the Ichimonji schools of the Kamakura period in English ? This seems
like an interesting area for me to further my studies ! 
 
- Matt
